entry.def: In cricket, if a player hits a four, they score four runs by hitting the ball along the ground so that it crosses the boundary at the edge of the playing area.

example.ex: Taylor hit 13 fours and batted for 140 minutes.
example.tran: 泰勒打了 13 个 4 分球，击球时间为 140 分钟。

entry.def: A four is a narrow racing boat that is rowed by a team of four people.
If you are on all fours, your knees, feet, and hands are on the ground.
